description: Name for the new captcha action. Must begin with an ASCII alphanumeric or underscore (_) character, and must contain only ASCII alphanumeric, underscore, hash (#), period (.), space, colon (:), at (@), equals (=), and hyphen (-) characters. Cannot be changed after an action is created.
The following requirement applies only to the NetScaler CLI:
If the name includes one or more spaces, enclose the name in double or single quotation marks (for example, "my action" or 'my action').
This is the endpoint at which captcha response is validated.
Secret of gateway as established at the captcha source.
Sitekey to identify gateway fqdn while loading captcha.
This is the group that is added to user sessions that match current policy.
